name: > Get Nodes Of Alert IPs
description: Playbook get nodes from Nozomi for Assets IP Address.

steps.name: Comment On Destination IP Node Assets

resource.content:
Correlated following involved Nodes as an Assets for Alert {{vars.input.params.alertData['name']}} Destination IP: {{vars.input.params.alertData['destinationIp']}}


{% for data in vars.destinationIPAsset %}{{loop.index}}. {{data.hostname}}
{% endfor %}

steps.name: Get Not Found Source ID Node

arguments.foundSourceID: {% set data = [] %}{% for item in vars.sourceIpNode %}{% if item['id'] in vars.sourceIPNodeAsset | json_query('[*]["ip"][][]') %}{% set _ = data.append(item) %}{% endif %}{% endfor %}{{data}}
arguments.notFoundSourceID: {% set data = [] %}{% for item in vars.sourceIpNode %}{% if item['id'] not in vars.sourceIPNodeAsset | json_query('[*]["ip"][][]') %}{% set _ = data.append(item) %}{% endif %}{% endfor %}{{data}}

steps.name: Get Not Found Destination ID Node

arguments.foundDestinationID: {% set data = [] %}{% for item in vars.destinationIpNode %}{% if item['id'] in vars.destinationIPNodeAsset | json_query('[*]["ip"][][]') %}{% set _ = data.append(item) %}{% endif %}{% endfor %}{{data}}
arguments.notFoundDestinationID: {% set data = [] %}{% for item in vars.destinationIpNode %}{% if item['id'] not in vars.destinationIPNodeAsset | json_query('[*]["ip"][][]') %}{% set _ = data.append(item) %}{% endif %}{% endfor %}{{data}}

params.value:
Correlated involved Nodes as an Assets fetched from Nozomi for Alert's Destination IP: {{vars.input.params.alertData['destinationIp']}}
{% if vars.foundDestinationID | length > 0 %} List of Nodes found in Nozomi: {% for data in vars.foundDestinationID %} {% for item in data['protos'] %} {% set result = vars.destinationIPAsset | json_query("[?contains(ip, '"+data['id']+"')]") %} {% endfor %} {% endfor %}
Node ID Protocol Last Activity
{{data['id']}} {{item['name']}} {{arrow.get(item['last_activity'] | int).format("YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss")}}

{% endif %} {% if vars.notFoundDestinationID | length > 0 %} List of Nodes not found in Nozomi:
{% for data in vars.notFoundDestinationID %} {% for item in data['protos'] %} {% endfor %} {% endfor %}
Node ID Protocol Last Activity
{{data['id']}} {{item['name']}} {{arrow.get(item['last_activity'] | int).format("YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss")}}
{% endif %}

steps.name: Comment On Alert For Source IP Node
Comment On Alert For Destination IP Node

arguments.name: Nozomi Networks Central Management Console

steps.name: Comment On Source IP Node Assets

resource.content:
Correlated following involved Nodes as an Assets for Alert {{vars.input.params.alertData['name']}} Source IP {{vars.input.params.alertData['sourceIp']}}


{% for data in vars.sourceIPAsset %}{{loop.index}}. {{data.hostname}}
{% endfor %}

steps.name: Get Asset By Destination IP Node

arguments.name: Nozomi Networks Central Management Console

params.value:
Correlated involved Nodes as an Assets fetched from Nozomi for Alert's Source IP: {{vars.input.params.alertData['sourceIp']}}
{% if vars.foundSourceID | length > 0 %} List of Nodes found in Nozomi: {% for data in vars.foundSourceID %} {% for item in data['protos'] %} {% set result = vars.sourceIPAsset | json_query("[?contains(ip, '"+data['id']+"')]") %} {% endfor %} {% endfor %}
Node ID Protocol Last Activity
{{data['id']}} {{item['name']}} {{arrow.get(item['last_activity'] | int).format("YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss")}}

{% endif %} {% if vars.notFoundSourceID | length > 0 %} List of Nodes not found in Nozomi:
{% for data in vars.notFoundSourceID %} {% for item in data['protos'] %} {% endfor %} {% endfor %}
Node ID Protocol Last Activity
{{data['id']}} {{item['name']}} {{arrow.get(item['last_activity'] | int).format("YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss")}}
{% endif %}

steps.name: Get Asset By Source IP Node

arguments.name: Nozomi Networks Central Management Console

conditions.step_name: Get Asset By Source IP Node
Get Asset By Destination IP Node

routes.name: Create Destoination IP Node Assets -> Comment On Destination IP Node Assets
Get Asset By Source IP Node -> Get Not Found Source ID Node
Comment On Source IP Node Assets -> Summary Of Source Nodess
Create Source IP Node Assets -> Comment On Source IP Node Assets
Get Not Found Destination ID Node -> Create Destoination IP Node Assets
Get Not Found Source ID Node -> Create Source IP Node Assets
Summary Of Found Source Nodes -> Comment On Alert For Source IP Node
Comment On Destination IP Node Assets -> Copy of Summary Of Found Source Nodes
Get Asset For Alert -> Get Nodes
Summary Of Found Destination Nodes -> Comment On Alert For Destination IP Node
Get Asset By Destination IP Node -> Get Not Found Destination ID Node
Get Nodes -> Is Source IP Node Found
Is Source IP Node Found -> Get Asset By Source IP Node
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Get Nodes -> Is Destination IP Node Found
Is Destination IP Node Found -> Get Asset By Destination IP Node
routes.label: Yes
